languages.text: Whenever the wearer uses a Navigator power, they always physically {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} the next attack by moving to a random adjacent cell. This effect doesn't apply to {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the wearer uses a Navigator power, they always physically {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} the next attack by moving to a random adjacent cell. This effect doesn't apply to {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

Whenever the wearer uses a Navigator power, they always physically {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} the next attack by moving to a random adjacent cell. This effect doesn't apply to {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

Whenever the wearer uses a Navigator power, they always physically {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} the next attack by moving to a random adjacent cell. This effect doesn't apply to {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

languages.text: 每当装备者使用导航者能力之后，当装备者下次遭受攻击时，会移动至随机的邻近格子处，自动{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}此次攻击。此效果对{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}无效。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer uses a Navigator power, they always physically {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} the next attack by moving to a random adjacent cell. This effect doesn't apply to {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 每当装备者使用导航者能力之后，当装备者下次遭受攻击时，会移动至随机的邻近格子处，自动{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}此次攻击。此{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}对{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}无效。

languages.text: Применяя силу навигатора, персонаж всегда физически {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклоняется{/g} от следующей атаки, перемещаясь на случайную соседнюю клетку. Данный эффект не распространяется на {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer uses a Navigator power, they always physically {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} the next attack by moving to a random adjacent cell. This effect doesn't apply to {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Применяя силу навигатора, персонаж всегда физически {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклоняется{/g} от следующей атаки, перемещаясь на случайную соседнюю клетку.
Если персонажу не удается переместиться, он получает {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}ошеломление{/g} и +1 уровень {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}замешательства{/g}.

Применяя силу навигатора, персонаж всегда физически {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклоняется{/g} от следующей атаки, перемещаясь на случайную соседнюю клетку.
Если персонажу не удается переместиться, он получает {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}ошеломление{/g} и +1 уровень {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}замешательства{/g}.

languages.text: 使用者が航宙士パワーを使用するたび、隣接するマスにランダムに移動して次の攻撃を物理的に{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}する。この効果は{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}には適用されない。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer uses a Navigator power, they always physically {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} the next attack by moving to a random adjacent cell. This effect doesn't apply to {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 使用者が航宙士の力を使用するたび、ランダムな隣接するマスに移動して次の{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}攻撃{/g}を物理的に回避する。この{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}は{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}には適用されない。

languages.text: Cada vez que el portador use un poder de navegante, siempre {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} físicamente el siguiente ataque moviéndose a una casilla adyacente al azar. Este efecto no se aplica a {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer uses a Navigator power, they always physically {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} the next attack by moving to a random adjacent cell. This effect doesn't apply to {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Cada vez que el portador use un poder de navegante, siempre {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquiva{/g} físicamente el siguiente ataque moviéndose a una casilla adyacente al azar.
Si el portador no puede esquivar un ataque con este movimiento, se queda {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}desequilibrado{/g} y obtiene +1 acumulación de {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplejo{/g}.

languages.text: Immer wenn der Träger eine Navigator-Kraft nutzt, wird er dem nächsten Angriff physisch {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}ausweichen{/g}, indem er sich auf ein zufälliges angrenzendes Feld bewegt. Bei {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffen{/g} greift dieser Effekt nicht.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer uses a Navigator power, they always physically {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} the next attack by moving to a random adjacent cell. This effect doesn't apply to {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Immer wenn der Träger eine Navigator-Kraft nutzt, wird er dem nächsten Angriff immer physisch {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}ausweichen{/g}, indem er sich auf eine zufällige angrenzende Zelle bewegt.
Kann der Träger dem Angriff mit dieser Bewegung nicht ausweichen, wird er {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Taumelnd{/g} und erhält +1 Stapel {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Überrascht{/g}.

Immer wenn der Träger eine Navigator-Kraft nutzt, wird er dem nächsten Angriff physisch {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}ausweichen{/g}, indem er sich auf ein zufälliges angrenzendes Feld bewegt. Bei {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffen{/g} greift dieser {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}Effekt{/g} nicht.

languages.text: Lorsque l'utilisateur a recours à un pouvoir de navigateur, il {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} toujours physiquement l'attaque suivante en se déplaçant vers une case adjacente aléatoire. Cet effet ne s'applique pas aux {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer uses a Navigator power, they always physically {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} the next attack by moving to a random adjacent cell. This effect doesn't apply to {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Chaque fois que l'utilisateur a recours à un pouvoir de Navigateur, il {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g} toujours physiquement l'attaque suivante en se déplaçant vers une case adjacente aléatoire.
Si ce déplacement ne permet pas à l'utilisateur d'esquiver l'attaque, il subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Sidération{/g} et obtient +1 cumul de l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Perplexité{/g}.

Chaque fois que l'utilisateur a recours à un pouvoir de Navigateur, il {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g} toujours physiquement l'attaque suivante en se déplaçant vers une case adjacente aléatoire.
Si ce déplacement ne permet pas à l'utilisateur d'esquiver l'attaque, il subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Sidération{/g} et obtient +1 cumul de l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Perplexité{/g}.

Lorsque l'utilisateur a recours à un pouvoir de navigateur, il {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} toujours physiquement l'attaque suivante en se déplaçant vers une case adjacente aléatoire. Cet {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effet{/g} ne s'applique pas aux {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g}.

languages.text: Takan kişi, Rotacı gücü kullandığında bir sonraki saldırıdan bitişikteki rastgele bir hücreye geçerek her daim {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınır{/g}. Bu etki, {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}fırsat saldırılarına{/g} uygulanmaz.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer uses a Navigator power, they always physically {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} the next attack by moving to a random adjacent cell. This effect doesn't apply to {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.
